attributes.action: make starting unsubstanstiated rumours about a Stock Market floated companies/banks a criminal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would appear than some city traders, and others, start negative rumours about companies and banks, without any foundation, in the hope of destabilising them, this should be illegal.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
